---
category: news
title: "New polyp image classification technique using transfer learning of network-in-network structure in endoscopic images"
excerpt: "This research improved the performance of polyp classification through the fine-tuning of Network-in-Network (NIN) after applying a pre-trained model of the ImageNet database. Random shuffling is performed 20 times on 1000 colonoscopy images."
